title: Ticket #5198: GSI authentication broken in blocking mode
description: In the changes to make authentication non-blocking on the server side of a CEDAR connection, GSI authentication was broken in blocking mode. The last part of the protocol is skipped on the server side. This went unnoticed because the server always uses non-blocking mode now.
remarks:
2015-Aug-05 11:52:02 by jfrey:
This bug has never manifested, so no version history is necessary.
check_ins: 2015-Aug-05 11:51   Check-in [45467]: Fix blocking server-side GSI authentication in CEDAR. #5198 When in blocking mode, the server side of GSI authentication was missing the last step of the protocol. This hasn't been a problem because the server side is always non-blocking now. (By Jaime Frey )
